name: my life as a currency
description:
Play as a little bill who has to grow his human to be able to get his girlfriend back by defeating Jimi Lotery in a bet duel !

Controls : Move : arrows / WASD

 Talk : T 

Bet : B

A game made by : Siboulotte Mathieu (GD / LD / Tech / Anim / Sound)
